title: Person of Interest: Season 1 Trailer
author: Lady Gisborne 15
comment: such a great but underated show!
This is by far the best serie ever.
Why was this show ever taken off the air? Even after all this time - I watch the DVD episodes from all 4 and 1/2 seasons again and again. This show was total genius.

one of the best .....
Season 1 starts kinda slow but as it progress , its grow exponentially , each episode deepening the story and character development .
By the time you reach season 2 you will be amazed by the depth of story and direction.
description:
I LOVE THIS SHOW and totally recommend it!

Song: Warlord by Liquid Cinema
